Apps.Name: Best Circle Fit
Apps.Description: Best Circle Fit is the best "must have" casual game for tablets & phones. Easy to play, hard to quit, but well...it's a bit annoying and being smart and fast is your way out.Best Circle Fit is a cute, minimalist game of reflexes that has simplicity and addictive gameplay. The mechanics are actually really simple: tap the screen to release the ball and make sure they never touch. The balls will follow a circle pattern and your task will be to release all of them strategically, keeping them all separated.The trick? A ball's direction might be right or left and you never really know the exact path it will follow. So cross your fingers and pray you've tapped at the right moment. You might've gotten it right (or not!)Whoever tried this game first said:"This game is easy, dude" but then they tore their hair out.Just download and enjoy 559 different levels.Try not to hesitate to contact with us:info@rentiregames.comRentire Games

Apps.Name: Save Us!
Apps.Description: Little jellies needed to be saved,Touching the screen would be enough, but who would be so bold to be their hero was the real question.Be those little guys' hero.Save the jellies...They have a right to live like you and we have...But be extremely careful for the sharp and relentless knives.You just have to focus a little to save us.In this 1500 level journey, how far are you able to go?* IT IS TIME FOR YOU TO BE A HERO - DO NOT MISS THIS CHANCE *
